member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Cms.ClientExtensions.UnifiedSearchFor(EPiServer.Find.IClient,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a search for ISearchContent and types registered to be included in Unified Search results. Adds a free text query for standard text fields using the InStandardFields method. Automatically selects language used for stemming based on EPiServer.Globalization.ContentLanguage.PreferredCulture and configured culture to stemming mappings in the episerver.find section in app.config/web.config if any.
member.param: The IClient to create that will be used to build and execute the search.
The free text query to search for.

member.remarks: Does not filter by publication status, language branch or access rights.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Cms.ContentSearchExtensions.ExcludeContainerPages``1(EPiServer.Find.ITypeSearch{``0})
member.summary: Applies filters to excluding container pages.
member.remarks: Does not filter by publication status, language branch or access rights.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Cms.ContentSearchExtensions.ExcludeContentFolders``1(EPiServer.Find.ITypeSearch{``0})
member.summary: Applies filters to excluding content folders.
member.remarks: Does not filter by publication status, language branch or access rights.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Cms.ContentSearchExtensions.PublishedInCurrentLanguage``1(EPiServer.Find.ITypeSearch{``0},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Applies filters to excluding content that is not currently published in the active language branch.
member.param: The date/time at which the content should be published. Defaults to DateTime.Now.
member.remarks: Filters both by publication status and Start/Stop publish. Content from other language branches may be included according to fallback and replacement language rules. Content not implementing IVersionable will be treated as published. Content not implementing ILocalizable will be treated as being in the current language branch. Does not filter by access rights or whether content is deleted.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Cms.ContentSearchExtensions.PublishedInLanguage``1(EPiServer.Find.ITypeSearch{``0},System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Applies filters to excluding content that is not currently published in the specified language branch.
member.param: The date/time at which the content should be published. Defaults to DateTime.Now.
member.remarks: Filters both by publication status and Start/Stop publish. Content from other language branches may be included according to fallback and replacement language rules. Content not implementing IVersionable will be treated as published. Content not implementing ILocalizable will be treated as being in the specified language branch. Does not filter by access rights or whether content is deleted.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Cms.ContentSearchExtensions.FilterForVisitor``1(EPiServer.Find.ITypeSearch{``0},System.String)
member.summary: Applies filters to excluding content that normally would not be visible to the current user in view mode.
member.remarks: Filters by read access rights. The current user must either have read access to the content explicitly (as a user) or be in a group or virtual role that has access to the content. If the current user is anonymous the group Everyone must have read access to the content. Excludes content in the waste basket. Filters both by publication status and Start/Stop publish. Content from other language branches may be included according to fallback and replacement language rules. Content not implementing IVersionable will be treated as published. Content not implementing ILocalizable will be treated as being in the current language branch. Potentially filters on custom implementations of which has been registered.

member.summary: items that will be reindexed.

members.member:
Indexes the published or latest version of from all language branches according to instructions provided in .
Content to be indexed. /// Options for indexing. If null, a new instance of the IndexOptions class will be used.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Cms.SearchRequestExtensions.GetContentResult``1(EPiServer.Find.ITypeSearch{``0},System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the actual content matching retrieved from the default IContentRepository. When executed in context of a user without edit or admin access, or if is true the search request is cached for seconds.
member.typeparam: The type of content to search for and return.
member.param: The number of seconds to cache the search request's result for.
Enables the request to be cached for users with edit or admin access.
member.returns: The content matching the search request.
member.remarks: While the type constraint is for IContentData only IContent will be returned. If is not a type assignable from IContent a filter for IContent will be added to the search request. The number of content returned may differ from the search result if content from different sites have been indexed (such as when multiple developers or hosting environments use the same index) or if the index has not been updated due to failures while indexing/deleting from the index.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Cms.XhtmlStringProjectionProcessor.ReplaceAsHighlightedCall(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression)
member.summary: Replaces calls to AsHighlighted on XhtmlStrings with a call to AsHighlighted on an indexed methods return value. For instance it rewrited x.MainBody.AsHighlighted() to x.MainBody.AsViewedByAnonymous().AsHighlighted()

member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Cms.XhtmlStringProjectionProcessor.ReplaceAsCroppedCall(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression)
member.summary: Replaces calls to AsCropped on XhtmlStrings with a call to AsCropped on an indexed methods return value. For instance it rewrited x.MainBody.AsCropped() to x.MainBody.AsViewedByAnonymous().AsCropped()
